N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 542.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) The Office of

Mental Health is responsible for developing standards which provide an adequate
level of safety for patients and residents receiving services in facilities
operated or licensed by the Office of Mental Health. (b) This regulation sets forth the general
rule prohibiting possession of firearms at State psychiatric facilities and
facilities licensed by the Office of Mental Health. (c) This regulation also sets forth the
limited circumstances under which an exception to this general rule may be
granted and the safety standards to which an individual who has been granted
such an exception must adhere. Notes
